efttools documentation

<no title>

Contents

efttools revolves around the manipulation of tensors, which are objects of the class efttools.algebra.Tensor. Every kind of object that appears inside a lagrangian including fields, coupling constants, structure constants, numeric coefficients and masses can be represented by an instance of this class.

Direct usage of the Tensor constructor obscures the code. Two classes are defined to make the process of creating tensors easier and cleaner, efttools.algebra.TensorBuilder and efttools.algebra.FieldBuilder.
